definition: big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
cat/CL:隻|只[zhi1]/(dialect) to hide oneself/(coll.) modem
Wolong giant panda nature reserve in Wenchuan county, northwest Sichuan
pinyin: wo4 long2 da4 xiong2 mao1 bao3 hu4 qu1

sentences.english: It was found that giant pandas in Fopinghad tke habit of seasonal vertical movement.
sentences.chinese: 結果表明，佛坪大熊貓有季節性垂直移動習性。

sentences.english: If farmers keep taking the land giants pandas will have nowhere to live.
sentences.chinese: 如果農民繼續攫娶土地，大熊貓就沒有地方可住了。

sentences.english: In zoology, the giant panda is Carnivora.
sentences.chinese: 在動物學上，大熊貓屬食肉目。

sentences.english: You are reading this because it is about giant pandas.
sentences.chinese: 你在看這篇文章，是因爲它有關大熊貓。

sentences.english: The giant panda is one of the surviving ancient animals.
sentences.chinese: 大熊貓是一種殘存的古動物。

sentences.english: A. What are the major efforts made by human beings to restore the giant panda population?
sentences.chinese: 人類爲大熊貓種羣復壯主要做了些什麼？

sentences.english: Schaller. The Chinese government has passed laws against killing pandas.
sentences.chinese: 中國政府已經通過了禁止捕殺大熊貓的法律。

sentences.english: In the end, some advices of the research of giant panda' staple food bamboo are supposed.
sentences.chinese: 最後進行了大熊貓主食竹種研究的問題分析及展望。

sentences.english: Only the Chinese have successfully bred pandas and raised their babies in captivity.
sentences.chinese: 只有中國人成功地進行了人工繁殖和哺育大熊貓。

sentences.english: So how and why did pandas became plant-eaters in the first place?
sentences.chinese: 那麼大熊貓最初是如何成爲食草動物的呢？

sentences.english: The center has already taken 53 pandas that had been living at the Wolong Nature Reserve.
sentences.chinese: 中心已經收容了臥龍自然保護區內的53只大熊貓。

sentences.english: Americans have bid a fond farewell to giant panda Tai Shan.
sentences.chinese: 美國民衆集體歡送大熊貓泰山。

sentences.english: But have you ever seen pandas living where they really live?
sentences.chinese: 但你曾在大熊貓真正生活的地方看到過它們嗎？

sentences.english: Almost exclusively, Giant Pandas eat bamboo.
One of my grandsons got to see the pandas at the zoo.
sentences.chinese: 我的一個孫子去動物園參觀了大熊貓。

sentences.english: The arrangement was set up under a Sino-Japanese cooperation program on giant panda breeding.
sentences.chinese: 這是中日合作大熊貓繁育項目的安排。

definition: one's conduct/deed/activity/accomplishment/achievement/to act as/as (in the capacity of)/qua/to view as/to look upon (sth as)/to take sth to be
site developed for a group of related enterprises/(industrial or technology) park
to fulfill one's dream/(divination) to predict the future by interpreting a dream/oneiromancy
